title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Q Methodology-Based Subjectivity Study Design for Math Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Q methodology procedures can be applied to systematically analyze the subjectivity of mathematics learners
Based on Q sorting results, at least three learner-type-specific profile characteristics can be derived
An implementation plan can be established to incorporate analytical results into mobile microlearning design
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
